fees.description: Charged when a direct debit payment has dishonoured or reversed. This charge is not subject to GST.
May be charged when you move into a property or change retailer. Actual fee may vary.
May be charged when you move out and require a final meter read. Actual fee may vary.

electricityContract.terms: Energy Locals offers no lock in contracts or exit fees. Prices may vary in accordance with the terms and conditions. See energylocals.com.au/terms for full terms and conditions.
electricityContract.variation: Due to changes in the market and economic conditions, we may update your tariff and/or fees. We will provide at least 5 business days' notice before the change takes place.

demandCharges.description: Demand Charge  All kW (c/kW Daily). Uses the maximum kW consumption from the meter readings within the period Mon - Fri, 17:00 - 20:00.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Retailer Feed-in Tariff (inc. GST, if any) | All kWh/day

electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: For more information on these fees and other fees, please visit energylocals.com.au/fees
